response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering its unique value proposition, I am offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exceptional value this product brings to its users. I trust that you will find it to be a worthwhile investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 200}
